channel.title: Supernatural
channel.description:
if you like supernatural, what was your favorite season 1-9 and for the people who don'y supernatural had a 9th season
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h381/raylaw1/Screenshot_4_zps833d8b0e.png[/img]
And out of all the seasons the 9th would be my favorite
This is my Skype

item.title: Supernatural
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Season 7 had the mother of all right? If I remember correctly she was the key to purgatory? If so that was probably the most forgettable season because I don’t remember much about it.

Yeah the mother of all I remember them all lol

Read full topic

item.title: Supernatural
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:7, topic:539961”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=658813.msg4406423#msg4406423 date=1392133665]

You like sneaky demons and asshole angels? This show is for you. You like two muscle man brothers? This show is for you.

Seriously though, if you’re into myths, supernatural, monsters and epic quests, then this show is what you want to watch. It has everything from demons and vampires to ghouls and Greek Gods.
[/quote]I mean, I’m into supernatural thriller type of movies/shows, but I can never seem to find any good ones. But I’m a picky person when it comes to media.

If you’re picky then give the show a go. It covers all aspects of genre from horror to comedy, even romance every now and then (that isn’t too cheesy). You cant go wrong watching this show.[/quote]

I skipped season 7, Time for a wedding I didn’t really like that episode seasone 8 was better with the leviathans

Read full topic

item.title: Supernatural
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:6, topic:539961”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=658813.msg4406384#msg4406384 date=1392117897]
You like sneaky demons and asshole angels? This show is for you. You like two muscle man brothers? This show is for you.

Seriously though, if you’re into myths, supernatural, monsters and epic quests, then this show is what you want to watch. It has everything from demons and vampires to ghouls and Greek Gods.
[/quote]I mean, I’m into supernatural thriller type of movies/shows, but I can never seem to find any good ones. But I’m a picky person when it comes to media.[/quote]
If you’re picky then give the show a go. It covers all aspects of genre from horror to comedy, even romance every now and then (that isn’t too cheesy). You cant go wrong watching this show.

Read full topic

item.title: Supernatural
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I haven’t seen any of season 9 yet because I want to wait for the whole season to release so I can watch in bulk. Season 8 had the biggest cliff hanger ever and I’m dying to just watch them. I’ve been slack with all my usual interests like Supernatural, Walking Dead and The Mentalist. The only thing that would beat Supernatural is if Chloe Moretz and Lily Rabe did a show together. As a director/film maker in training that is my career goal.

Read full topic
